text:
e="preserve">Elijah Moshinsky (8 January 1946 – 14 January 2021) was an Australian opera director, theatre director and television director. He worked at the Royal Opera House, the Metropolitan Opera, the Royal National Theatre and BBC Television. Moshinsky was born in Shanghai and but was raised in Melbourne.
Moshinsky died on 14 January 2021 in London, aged 75.
